title: Options Premium Selector
objective: Choose premium selling vs buying contexts using IV rank and term slope.
entry_logic: if iv_rank>0.7 and term_slope>0 => sell; if iv_rank<0.3 and term_slope<0 and momentum up => buy
caveats: Earnings and event risk can flip IV regimes; require liquidity filters.
beginner_summary: High IV usually favors selling premium; low IV can favor buying if trend helps.
assistant_hints: Avoid earnings windows unless designed for that risk.
Confirm low-IV buys with momentum; avoid dead markets.
